channel.title: Server yell (welcome to --------)
channel.description:
how do i make it where when you log in where it says welcome to -------- and then how do i make it where the server says the same things every few minutes like (join the forums at www.---------------.-----.com)
ty for the help i appreciate it

item.title: Server yell (welcome to --------)
item.dc:creator: @Veilpkz Veilpkz
item.description:
@Veilpkz wrote:

This is pretty simple, but its ok, I will still explain it,

Ok, open up your SOURCE FILES, then open up: client.java

Then, press Ctrl + F(Search) and search: Welcome

Then keep search by pressing the: Find Next button

Along the way, you should come up with something like this:

sM("Welcome to YOURSERVERNAME.");

After Welcome to you should see the name of a server, here is an example of what it should say…

sM("Welcome to Noobscape.");

Now, you will edit inside the quotation marks and DO NOT delete the " " or else you will come up with an error while compiling!

Ok now assuming you made up a name like “Nooberscape” you would change that line to this…

sM("Welcome to Nooberscape.");

Do that then compile and restart (OR) turn on your server!

Want to add more messages then just one?

The way i do it (cuz I’m lazy) is I copy that above code and just put it right under and edit between the " " marks to make it say something it else like

sM("Please don't ask Owner for Staff.");

That’s pretty much it!Good luck!

Read full topic
